Text: This is an a superb film, which I highly recommend. I have an old well-worn video that is almost unwatchable now, so I'm thrilled to find this here. Enjoy the twists and turns of the plot, it will keep you guessing right to the end! Many thanks ThorntonWilde for this.
BTW, the download is perfect - thanks again.
Thanks! Have wanted to see this ever since was spoofed on a Harvey Birdman, Attorney-at-Law, episode. Fantastic soundtrack.
